headline: Forget Kroger, another national grocery chain closing stores
summary: Supermarkets operate on razor-thin margins that make it very challenging to make a profit."The average net profit for food retailers in 2024 is 1.7%," according to data from the Food Industry Association (FIA).To make that small margin, operators stock an average of 31,795 items in stores that ...

headline: Chomps Takes a Bite Out of Barriers to Growth with NetSuite
summary: SuiteWorld -- Chomps, a leading snack brand known for its high-quality meat sticks, is using Oracle NetSuite to support its mission of delivering convenient and accessible snacks made with real ingredients. With NetSuite's unified business management suite, Chomps has been able to increase the speed and accuracy of financial processes, maximize visibility across its business, and establish a scalable foundation to support its continued growth.

headline: Instacart (CART): Evaluating Valuation Following Kroger-DoorDash Deal and Analyst Downgrades
summary: Maplebear (Instacart) shares have come under pressure after Kroger, one of its biggest customers, broadened its delivery partnership with DoorDash. The move increases competitive threats from other delivery giants. See our latest analysis for Maplebear. While Maplebear (Instacart) has rolled out innovative AI-powered partnerships and new product features this year, competitive pressures have weighed heavily on sentiment. The stock’s 1-year total shareholder return is down nearly 10%,...

summary: Kroger's strong ID sales, e-commerce growth, and DoorDash partnership boost earnings outlook. Learn why KR stock is rated a buy for long-term investors.

headline: Evercore ISI Remains Bullish on The Kroger Co. (KR)
summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE:KR) is one of the most undervalued retail stocks to invest in. On October 2, Evercore ISI analyst Michael Montani maintained a Buy rating on The Kroger Co. (NYSE:KR) and set a price target of $82.00. The Kroger Co. (NYSE:KR) reported in its fiscal Q2 2025 results that identical sales without fuel […]

headline: Pardon the Disruption: Has Kroger found its store of the future?
summary: Kroger’s Marketplace format is becoming a hub of innovation and a key tool in the grocer’s fight against strong regional competitors like Publix and H-E-B.
